biocontainers.name: circminer
biocontainers.summary: Sensitive and fast computational tool for detecting circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-Seq data.

biotools.summary: CircMiner is Accurate and Rapid Detection of Circular RNA through Splice-Aware Pseudo-Alignment Scheme. It is a sensitive and fast computational tool for detecting circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-Seq data.

bioschemas.name: CircMiner
bioschemas.summary: CircMiner is Accurate and Rapid Detection of Circular RNA through Splice-Aware Pseudo-Alignment Scheme. It is a sensitive and fast computational tool for detecting circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-Seq data.
